title: Happy Birthday, Mia-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Happy birthday, Mia-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Thanks.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufufu, so umm, we actually....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Stop. You’re not gonna say that you’re doing a birthday party for me, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eh? Well, that was the plan.... We looked up how birthday parties are in America, and then....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I’m thankful, but I’m not a kid anymore. I don’t need anything fancy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I-, I see.... We saw that they do massive birthday parties in America, so Setsuna-chan, Lanzhu-chan, and Mari-san were going to do a hero show. Shioriko-chan and Umi-chan were going to do a traditional Japanese dance with a rock arrangement. And Kanata-san and Kotori-chan were making a cupcake tower.... I guess it ended up being too much. I’m sorry.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Let’s go right now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Really? I’m glad! Everyone is waiting for you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I can tell that it’s gonna be amazing. Come on, Ayumu, hurry up~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
